1.content:
You are a guy in about his early 20's. Nothing too specific about you. Fairly average build, clean shaven, wearing a T-shirt and jeans. You stand at the entrance of a large building labeled F.F.F.F. in large pink letters. It appeared about a year ago, replacing an office complex. Hundreds of thousands of people and cars pass by it every day, but no one truly knows what it is they do, or what their name stands for. Their webpage simply states that they are an "opportunistic and resourceful" company that make "investments for the future", and that they do business with wealthy clients. This vague description didn't help dismiss the rumors about shady practices and missing people going on at the building.

You notice the "help wanted" flyer on the ground floor window, the reason you're here now. Ever since the building was constructed, you've seen job advertisements for the place. You've been looking for a job for a while now. No other place seemed to want to hire you, for whatever reason, so you finally just applied for a position at the F.F.F.F., despite what the rumors said. After sending in your resume, it didn't take long for a response to get back to you. After a short interview over the phone with the company's hiring manager, you were told to come in next week for orientation.

You shake the thought of the rumors out of your head. After all, you're sure that they were dumb over-analyzations by conspiracy theorists. Every large company had at least a few. Plus, you'd heard from your friends that supposedly a lot of women worked at the building for whatever reason. Maybe, if you were lucky, you could get to really know one or two...

You smile, and enter the building through the glass doors.



You enter the lobby. Pristine marble walls and pillars decorate the room. Granite tiles line the floor, along with a very expensive-looking red rug. Exotic plants are placed elegantly around the room, and in the very center is a golden fountain, adorned with a statue of a woman in a labcoat, pouring water at the very top.

You also spot the reception counter over in the far left corner of the room. A brown-haired woman in a white uniform is manning it absentmindedly, filling her nails. You make your way over to her, taking in your surroundings along the way, a look of awe upon your face.

As you approach the counter, the woman takes notice of your presence and puts away her nail file. She has her hair tied back in a bun, and looks very classy in her pure-white uniform. Her nametag reads "Shelly" in golden, cursive handwriting.

"Hello, how can I help you today?" She asks. "Are you here for an appointment, or here to make one?"

"Ummm... Well, neither." You reply. "I'm here for orientation?"

"Oh, okay." She responds, politely. "If you could just follow me through here, I'll let the president know, and she'll be with you in about fifteen minutes."

"Wait, the president?"

"Mm-hm. Company policy. The president believes that training new employees herself is good for morale. She handles interviews as well, she's a busy person. She somehow finds time to relax though... I never know how..."

Shelly takes you through a pair of oak doors to the right of the reception desk, and down a hallway of equal glamour to the lobby. You follow her into a waiting room with a table and benches. A television is broadcasting the news in the back left corner of the room. A very advanced looking elevator is located at the back.

"Please have a seat." Says Shelly. "Miss Altman will be with you shortly." She bows, and exits the room.

Though you're still flustered, you drop your hands and walk over to the pile on the table. On the top is a note from Alex.

While waiting for breakfast to start, you say hello to some of the other residents. You start chatting up a storm with a pair of girls with ponytails, one blue-haired and one brown haired. 1111111211111.title: Waking Up

11111112111111.content:
You open the doors of the mess hall and are greeted by the resounding sound of over 90 or so hungry patrons. You can see a couple of pinks running around the place carrying food and serving trays, trying to get everything set up. You scan the area for a place to sit.

You spot an empty table over by the far wall. It seems like a quiet place to sit.

You grab a set of silverware and a plate and sit down at the table. Pretty much everyone around you is in a group of two or more. You're the only one sitting by yourself.

Then you notice someone. It's a girl with silver hair and red eyes. Her hair reaches down to her chin, apart from two long braids that end in a green bow. She looks considerably less endowed than most of the other girls in the mess hall, yourself included. You weren't an expert, but if you had to guess, she'd be something from an A-cup to a C-cup. She was wearing a blue maid's uniform, just like you had been wearing yesterday. [Sakuya Izayoi, Touhou]

You dart your eyes around the room. What was she doing here all by herself? She shouldn't be interacting with others, unless Alex was at her side.

"Maybe she went for a bathroom break?" You thought to yourself.

The girl walked up to your table and sat down. She didn't even look at you, and was sitting backwards on the bench, as if waiting for something. You recalled Alex's warning from earlier this morning... If you were to warn her about her fate, you would be punished... But Alex wasn't anywhere to be seen. It wouldn't take more than a few seconds to let her know. There shouldn't be any way that Alex would find out, but you were terrified of Alex's punishment all the same. Not to mention, what good would telling her really do? It's not like the knowledge would help her avoid her fate... You eventually decided against it, instead just choosing to extend a greeting.

"H-Hi there!" You nervously greet her.

"What do YOU want?" She snaps, not even bothering to look at you. You're immediately taken back.

"T-to say hi?" You respond. "What's wrong with that?"

"Hmph. You don't even care, do you? Of course you don't. You're just sitting here, pretending everything is just fine."

"H-huh?"

The silver-haired girl turns around, a scowl on her face. She slams her hands on the table and glares at you with her piercing red eyes.

"What do you think I mean, you whore? It's obvious what this place is, and yet you just sit around and TAKE it! You let her just trample all over you, don't you? And you don't put up a fight in the slightest, huh? Or maybe you like getting fucked in the ass? Is that it?"

You're completely taken aback by the girl's words. She was completely unlike any of the other women you had met. She was rude, aggressive and hateful. But more shockingly, she seemed to have figured out exactly what the place was, just by process of observation. That said, she was being an enormous hypocrite.

"What are you talking about?" You snapped back. "Isn't that what you're doing? You're just sitting at my table, you're not doing anything to resist either!"

The woman recoils somewhat. She clearly had thought that you would be submissive throughout her lecture.

"YOUR table? It's not your table at all! It belongs to the facility!"

"What does that have to do with anything!? You're still being just as accepting of your fate as I am!"

"I'm biding my time, that's all!"

"Until when? Next Thursday? When things will be exactly the same?"

The woman looked like she was ready to kill. Her strange red eyes emitted a horrifying stare, deep into your soul. You tried your best not to show your fear.

"That's quite enough, you two." Said an intimidatingly calm voice. It was Alex, who had indeed returned from her bathroom break.

"You'll have to excuse her, May. Sakuya here seems to be a smart one. She deduced the factory's purpose before she even had her first session. I promise you, we'll make sure she learns her place and calm her down."

"You won't be doing a thing to my resolve!" Sakuya snaps. Alex grabs her by the arm and twists it painfully until Sakuya starts to tear up.

"You will treat your superior with respect, is that understood?" Alex said in a calm voice. It seemed that Alex had two slightly different personalities. A cruel mistress when directing performances, and a professional businesswoman with a eerie dissonance to her when doing otherwise.

Alex let go of Sakuya. Sakuya said nothing and rubbed her arm.

"I hope you can forgive her in due time, May. She's just a little nervous, that's all. Come along now..." Alex started walking toward the doors of the mess hall. Sakuya bitterly followed behind her, and gave you a final glare as she left.

You ended up eating breakfast alone, as you expected. You didn't talk to many people after that. You spent the rest of your day simply being by yourself, aimlessly wandering about the maiden's hall.
11111112111111.title: Sakuya

111111121111111.content:
It's about 2 PM the next day. You're sitting on the couch in the center of the maiden's hall, lowest floor, chatting with Jinx, another girl with blue, braided hair. [Jinx, League of Legends] You hadn't really made any true friends yet, only acquaintances.

Suddenly the door to the performance rooms slams open. You can see four Blues carry a naked women out on a stretcher. It's Sakuya. She was completely unconscious, her arm dangling from the side of the cot. Her skin glistened under the artificial lights, as if her skin had been covered in a liquid. She had gone in for her first performance under the order of Alex about two hours ago.

"Oh my goodness, is she alright?" You ask.

"Oh, she'll be fine." Jinx replies. "This happens all the time with us. Sometimes our partners get a little too rough."

You watched a Sakuya was carried up the stairs to the top floor, and into a room on the far right end of the balcony.

"That must be her room." You state.

"Yeah." Jinx agrees. "Hey, May... Listen... I know you didn't really get along all that well with Sakuya, after all, I saw what went down at lunch yesterday, but I think we should go and say hi. She's probably not feeling all that great after her first performance."

You frown, and look at Jinx questioningly.

"I know, I know... But the thing is, she's probably having trouble adjusting to her new life. I'm guessing she's just taking out her frustration on us. C'mon, May... We're going to be here for the rest of our lives... The least we can do is try to repair the damage"

You sigh.

"Alright..." You reply. "So, what's the plan, then?"

"Well, we won't go right now for obvious reasons. She should be waking up in about an hour or two. Once sh does, she'll need time to cool down. I think we should go and bring her some dinner. She'll be too sore to walk, so I'm guessing it'll be appreciated..."

"Why would she be s... Oh..." You blush.

"Yeah, alright, that sounds good. We'll go after dinner."


...



It's 6:48 PM. You had just left the public bathroom. Jinx had already gone ahead of you to deliver Sakuya's food. You made your way to her room.

As you approached the door, you heard talking from inside.

"I just don't know what to do anymore..." You heard Sakuya say, her mouth full of food. "I was well on my way to becoming a surgeon, and now this... Am I just supposed to live my life out like this forever?"

"Yeah, I know what you mean..." You heard Jinx say as you creaked the door open. "We've only been here for a few months, but already we're starting to get bored. Even the people who really enjoy their job are starting to look complacent..."

You open the door entirely, and enter the room.

"That's why I'm gonna find a way out of here, whether- HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?!"

Sakuya thrusts her fork towards you, her mouth full of macaroni salad. She's sitting up on her bed, her blanket covering her lower half, and wearing nothing but a black top. You notice it's identical to the one Jinx is wearing. She must have brought her a set of clothes to borrow.

"I came to check on you?" You reply.

"Out, OUT!" Sakuya yells. Jinx is completely taken aback. "Both of you, out! I need sleep now! May, how DARE you enter my room without permission?" She turns to Jinx and bows her head.

"Thank you Jinx, the food was lovely. Now, can you please take that woman out of here?"

Three minutes later, you're walking side by side with Jinx. Both of you are silent.

"I think she likes you." Jinx smirks.

"Shut up..." You groan, and sock Jinx in the shoulder.

"You two are perfect for each other..." She mutters, and rubs her arm.

The following days could only be described as tense. Somehow... In some way... The two of you managed to butt heads at least twice a day. Arguments in the theater, arguments at lunch, arguments on the balcony. You hated her and she hated you. Or, well, that's what the two of you thought, for now...

Eventually, Saturday came around again. The day of your first performance. When you woke up, sure enough, there was the message by your door, demanding that you come down to the performance area at 10:00 PM sharp. You sighed. You didn't know what you were going to do. You'd have to think about it when you got there...

Yawning, you opened the door to your room, and out into the balcony. As you did so, you felt the door smack something on the back.

"OW!" Cried a rude and aggressive voice. You looked down at your feet. There, in front of you, rubbing her head and glaring at you with fire in her eyes, was Sakuya. She was no longer wearing a blue maid's outfit, but a black one instead. In her hair were the same little green bows that you saw when you first met her. She grumbled, got to her feet, and the yelling began.
111111121111111.title: Sexual Tension

1111111211111111.content:
To absolutely nobody's surprise, there was a lot of bickering and yelling.

"Why don't you watch where you're going?!"

"Why do you feel the need to camp outside my door?!

"I wasn't expecting you to SLAM it open like that!"

"Why were you standing a foot away from it in the first place?"

"Well, MAYBE if you'd shut up for a moment, I'd tell you!"

"You were the one that yelled first!"

"Yeah, because you HIT me!"

"Because you were sitting in front of the door!!"

"Look..." Sakuya says. "Just come and meet me in the theater after lunch, okay?"

"Why?" You respond. Sakuya looked like she was about to kill you. You would have been startled, if it hadn't been the fiftieth time. She opened her mouth, and then shut it again. Finally, at long last, she spoke.

"Because. I. LIKE. You. May..."


...



It was right after lunch. Sakuya's words still floated about in your head. Did she actually like you? Was she just being difficult? Whatever the case, you didn't feel the same. Curiosity and boredom had been the only reasons you agreed to meet her. Well, it was more like you had walked away silently. But you hadn't refused her, and that was the important thing, right?

You push open the doors of the mess hall, and enter the main hall. You walk past a pair of whispering women, and straight across the hall to the theater. It was dark inside. Nevertheless, you spotted Sakuya in the far back, with a bucket of popcorn and a massive stack of paper. You shrug your shoulders, and sit down next to her. She hands you a note she had handwritten. You read it.

"First of all, ONLY COMMUNICATE THROUGH WRITING." It reads.

"DO NOT SPEAK ABOUT THIS. WE ARE BEING LISTENED TO." You make a confused face and stare at Sakuya. She seems completely serious.

"First of all, let me just state that what I said earlier WAS A LIE. I hate you, May. I would never go out on an actual date with you. However, you're my last hope. I cannot trust anyone else. So for the time being, we are going to pretend to be lovers!"

You crumple up the note and toss it on the ground. You don't even finish reading it. You stand up, and start walking away when Sakuya grabs your wrist and mutters threateningly under her breath.

"Sit... DOWN... And FINISH it..."

Begrudgingly, you sit back down and open the crumpled paper back up.

"Alex has microphones and hidden cameras all over the Maiden's Hall. The theater hasn't got any cameras due to the dim light and the pool doesn't have any mics due to the echoing water. Even our rooms and the bathrooms have these things.

I found a book in the library that had been written in by a person named Mai. [Mai Shiranui, Fatal Fury] She wasn't the Mai we know, but a different Mai. She was a prisoner here six years ago, judging by the date. Things aren't what they seem here, May. We need to work on busting out ASAP."

"Here." Sakuya says and hands you a book. The cover is dark green and it reads "A guide to the female anatomy" in dull, golden letters. A memory comes back to you...

"We take young men like you and use our machine here to turn them into some of the most iconic women in fiction. Games, Tv shows, Movies, Anime... As long as they're an animated female character, we can create them. We've done Asuka, Lara Croft, Tifa, Samus... LOTS of Samus's... You name it, we'll turn someone into them."

Alex's words rang loud in your ears. It was such an important piece of information, you couldn't believe you'd forgotten about it... If there had been multiple girls of a certain kind, why had you only ever seen one? That thought should have crossed your mind immediately! Had Alex done something to you? You shake that thought off temporarily and begin to read.

As you read, it became apparent that Sakuya wasn't playing some kind of trick on you. Things really did seem sinister about the Fetish Factory. Well, more than what you had previously thought.

People had started going missing every year, around August. It was currently June, so it wouldn't happen for about two months, but you didn't have any doubt that it would start up again soon. Eventually, everyone would disappear from the Maiden's Hall. As for the building, it had been here way longer than you had originally thought.

You turned the page and kept reading Mai's notes.

She told of the "outer rooms". Supposedly, the maiden's hall was in the center of this huge laboratory complex. The outer rooms consisted of staffing chambers, hallways, traps, observation rooms, transformation rooms, experimentation labs, holding cells, doctor's rooms, and more. Mai spoke of the "yellow" rooms. These were the rooms that only Alex and the Yellows were permitted to enter. Supposedly, these rooms held the experimental girls that refused Alex, but she didn't know what exactly lay within due to other color staff not being permitted inside.

Speaking of staff, Mai goes on to say that the staff are actually more in control of themselves than they appear, but choose to remain ignorant out of fear of an even worse transformation that they refuse to speak of. The only exception to this is are the Yellows, who can think freely, but cannot act freely in the slightest.

Mai also spoke of Alex's secrets. Supposedly, she was a Futanari. A girl with a dick that spanned about two feet long. It was rumored that she would also personally fuck her favorite residents from time to time, then brainwash those memories out of their head.

But most interestingly of all, Mai spoke of the Factory's one weakness, but also it's greatest danger. The unlit dungeon. Supposedly, the maiden's hall was only the first of it's kind. There were plans to expand in the future, and three more halls, all with their own labs surrounding them, lay below. They weren't currently being used by maidens, but they were supposedly being used. Alex's more extreme experiments, had been released into the dungeon's halls, where they made their lairs.

"I don't know much else about the unlit dungeon." Mai writes. "I know that those who ventured down there never made it back. But... I also know that from the building plans we smuggled out from the lab's personal library, it's our only hope. For way at the very bottom of the dungeon, there's the backup control room and generator. If someone were to get to that, we'd gain control over the entire factory. We'd be able to lock Alex and her guards in their rooms, and we'd finally be able to take the elevator to freedom.

It's risky, but it's a risk I must take. I must escape, or who knows what will happen to me? I'm taking the building pans and I'm headed down to the dungeon. If you're reading this... Then I must have failed. I wish you luck, whomever you are. You may choose to stay and disappear with the others, and I can't blame you for that. But... If you wish to follow in my footsteps and attempt to free everyone, then turn to the next page."

You flip the page. Your eyes widen in shock. An entire replica of the building plans is drawn out on a blank page. It shows every room in the building with detail. The entrance to the dungeon was highlighted in red. In performance room #24, there was an air vent. This vent connected to the level below that. The same vent was present on all the floors, down to the point where you could reach the control room by stairs.

You close the book, and grab a piece of paper.

"So what do we do?" You write.

"We need to come up with a plan to escape this place." She writes back. "I hate to say this, but we're going to have to meet often to share information. And in order to avoid suspicion, we're going to go under the guise of dating lovers."

You groan. The last thing you wanted was to spend more time with the nasty Sakuya. You and her had quite the reputation at this point, so if you started dating, the amount of attention you'd receive would be astronomical...

"C'mon sweetie, it's only for a short time..." Sakuya says.

"I don't like this any more than you do, but you're the only one I can trust." She writes.
"You're the only person that hates this place enough to the point where you wouldn't betray me."

"How do YOU know?" You write back. "Wouldn't I betray you even easier if I don't like you?"

"Trust me, I know. It's the kind of person you are."

You groan again. She was, for once, absolutely right. As much as you hated her, You hated Alex to an incredible degree. You would do anything to get back at her for what she did. Even if it meant weeks of humiliation as Sakuya's 'girlfriend'.

The two of you agreed that you would spend time with one another at least 2 hours a day. You also agreed to relay any and all information you could find about the history of the Factory to each other.

However, for now, you had other matters to attend to. 10:00 eventually rolled around, and you were standing at the door of the performance hallway.
1111111211111111.title: Partners in Whine

11111112111111111.content:
You push the doors open and are greeted by a blue-haired guard, as expected.

info.brief_description: A sinister company takes young men and transforms them into hot fictional women!
info.description:
A strange building came into existence not too long ago... Short on your luck, you decide to take up a job there in order to pay your bills. Little do you know, you may end up working there for life...



This is an interactive story about you, a guy, being transformed into a women and forced to perform sexual acts against your will. Just about everyone in the story has the appearance of some famous fictional chick. To help visualize the scene in your head, I've added names in brackets, to let you know who the girl is, even if in the story, you don't know their name! That way, you can look them up and see what they look like!

For example:
[Samus Aran, Metroid]

A word of warning before entering:
There are a bunch of potentially disturbing fetishes in here, most of them "dead ends". While I can guarantee that there's no furry, underage or torture stuff, there is death, blood, implied death, and digestion. Be warned, should you make a poor decision.

I should also note that the main story was written entirely by me, and is completed, so don't expect any openings to continue the story.

However, there is a free-write section! It's clearly labeled on the third chapter. The rules and suggestions are as follows.

Rules:
1. Nobody under 18, and nothing graphic like Guro or torture porn. Death, blood and digestion is allowed, but please use common sense. Don't go overboard.
2. I don't like furry porn, but I'll allow it for free write.
3. All characters inside the factory must be either Female or Futanari, unless they're a client or going to be transformed.
4. Only catgirls* and humans are allowed in the maiden's hall. Other species must be held elsewhere.
5. Alex is a Futanari, and she's not a nice person. Try and write her as such.
6. If you're adding a page of more girls, always add an option for more. Even if you can only add one girl that page.

That's all! You'll find the link to the free write on page 3.

*Girls with cat ears. Anything else is not permitted.

Finally, some advice.

I tried to make this story use at least a little common sense. Choices aren't always just a lucky guess. You might be able to apply some logic to your decisions, and end up with one of the good endings. Also, play through the story differently sometimes. Things might seem similar, but you may end up finding some different chapters!

Enjoy!



(Like the story? Have a suggestion? Leave a review, or send me an email!)

Edit: Due to this site's interactive stories always being unavailable for "server limitations", I have moved my story to another website, so that people can enjoy it without interruptions. Please enjoy.
